Question.Subject: If i am following a celeb on twitter and go @katewinslet(forexample) can they see what i say to them?
Question.Content: on twitter if i want a celeb to reply to me, how do i do it? i've tried typing "@" and their name after with my message but i don't get any replies :( i haven't protected my tweets how do i get them to reply. i want to wish my favourite singer happy birthday tomorow on her youtube she said tweet me happy birthday tomorow how would i do this and would she see it? thanks.
Question.ChosenAnswer: yes you go on twitter, go to find people, find out her twitter name e.g. @sam_ni or whatever then you type @sam_ni happy birthday. and she'll see it.

Answer.Content: go on her page, and reply to any random tweet, than you will see her name followed after @. Than write your message. She will get it.
yes you go on twitter, go to find people, find out her twitter name e.g. @sam_ni or whatever then you type @sam_ni happy birthday. and she'll see it.
they probably dont look at them anyways...
